title: Raspberry Pi Button
short-descr: Report button press events on a Raspeberry Pi
description: In this project you will connect a button to a Raspberry Piâ€™s General-Purpose Input/Output
(GPIO) header. A cFS app monitors the button and reports button press events. You will gain
experience with using a library and app to interface and receive inputs from an external
popup-instructions:
Prior to restarting the Basecamp GUI, configure basecamp.ini to run the cFS with elevated privileges:
  'SUDO_START_CFS' to True
  'PASSWORD' to your Pi's password

See https://openmissionstack.com/projects_read/gpio_demo for operations instructions.
